title: Emeraude Toubia in Supernatural Horror Film 'Rosario' Official Trailer
description: "You're not leaving, are you?" Mucho Mas Releasing has unveiled an official trailer for an indie horror film titled Rosario, not to be confused with the actress Rosario Dawson (or anyone else named Rosario for that matter). This is getting a full nationwide theatrical release in theaters starting on May 2nd to help kick off the summer movie season. Wall Street stockbroker Rosario spends the night with her grandmother's body while she waits for the ambulance to arrive during a severe snowfall. She is attacked by otherworldly entities that have taken control of her grandmother's body... Starring Emeraude Toubia (seen in the "With Love" series) as the titular Rosario, along with David Dastmalchian, Paul Ben-Victor, José Zúñiga, Diana Lein, and Emilia Faucher. This look properly scary, with all kinds of crazy horrifying things happening to her inside this gigantic, creepy apartment. Made for horror fans to enjoy, and for everyone else to scream at. Here's the main official trailer (+ poster) for Felipe Vargas' horror Rosario, direct from YouTube: Wall Street stockbroker Rosario Fuentes (Emeraude Toubia), must spend the night inside her grandma's apartment after her sudden death. While sorting through her Grandmother's belongings, she uncovers a horrifying secret—a hidden […]

text: TRAILERS by March 19, 2025Source: YouTube "You're not leaving, are you?" Mucho Mas Releasing has unveiled an official trailer for an indie horror film titled Rosario, not to be confused with the actress Rosario Dawson (or anyone else named Rosario for that matter). This is getting a full nationwide theatrical release in theaters starting on May 2nd to help kick off the summer movie season. Wall Street stockbroker Rosario spends the night with her grandmother's body while she waits for the ambulance to arrive during a severe snowfall. She is attacked by otherworldly entities that have taken control of her grandmother's body... Starring Emeraude Toubia (seen in the "With Love" series) as the titular Rosario, along with David Dastmalchian, Paul Ben-Victor, José Zúñiga, Diana Lein, and Emilia Faucher. This look properly scary, with all kinds of crazy horrifying things happening to her inside this gigantic, creepy apartment. Made for horror fans to enjoy, and for everyone else to scream at. Here's the main official trailer (+ poster) for Felipe Vargas' horror Rosario, direct from YouTube: Wall Street stockbroker Rosario Fuentes (Emeraude Toubia), must spend the night inside her grandma's apartment after her sudden death. While sorting through her Grandmother's belongings, she uncovers a horrifying secret—a hidden chamber filled with occult artifacts that are tied to dark generational rituals. As supernatural occurrences plague her, Rosario must confront her family's buried secrets and face the truth about the sacrifices and choices they made. Rosario is directed by Colombian genre filmmaker Felipe Vargas, making his feature directorial debut with this horror, after many other shorts including Milk Teeth previously. The screenplay is written by Alan Trezza. Produced by Phillip Braun, Javier Chapa, and Jon Silk. This hasn't premiered at any film festivals or elsewhere, as far as we know. Mucho Mas Releasing will debut Vargas' Rosario film in theaters nationwide starting May 2nd, 2025 coming up soon. Anyone interested? Find more posts in: Horror, Indies, To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
March 19, 2025
Source: YouTube

"You're not leaving, are you?" Mucho Mas Releasing has unveiled an official trailer for an indie horror film titled Rosario, not to be confused with the actress Rosario Dawson (or anyone else named Rosario for that matter). This is getting a full nationwide theatrical release in theaters starting on May 2nd to help kick off the summer movie season. Wall Street stockbroker Rosario spends the night with her grandmother's body while she waits for the ambulance to arrive during a severe snowfall. She is attacked by otherworldly entities that have taken control of her grandmother's body... Starring Emeraude Toubia (seen in the "With Love" series) as the titular Rosario, along with David Dastmalchian, Paul Ben-Victor, José Zúñiga, Diana Lein, and Emilia Faucher. This look properly scary, with all kinds of crazy horrifying things happening to her inside this gigantic, creepy apartment. Made for horror fans to enjoy, and for everyone else to scream at.

Here's the main official trailer (+ poster) for Felipe Vargas' horror Rosario, direct from YouTube:

Wall Street stockbroker Rosario Fuentes (Emeraude Toubia), must spend the night inside her grandma's apartment after her sudden death. While sorting through her Grandmother's belongings, she uncovers a horrifying secret—a hidden chamber filled with occult artifacts that are tied to dark generational rituals. As supernatural occurrences plague her, Rosario must confront her family's buried secrets and face the truth about the sacrifices and choices they made. Rosario is directed by Colombian genre filmmaker Felipe Vargas, making his feature directorial debut with this horror, after many other shorts including Milk Teeth previously. The screenplay is written by Alan Trezza. Produced by Phillip Braun, Javier Chapa, and Jon Silk. This hasn't premiered at any film festivals or elsewhere, as far as we know. Mucho Mas Releasing will debut Vargas' Rosario film in theaters nationwide starting May 2nd, 2025 coming up soon. Anyone interested?

Find more posts in: Horror, Indies, To Watch, Trailer
